snippet: Advocacy groups barely waited for President Barack Obama to finish speaking about sweeping changes to the U.S. immigration system to start warning about scams....

headline.print_headline: Obama's Action Fuels Worry About Immigration Scams
headline.main: Obama's Action Fuels Worry About Immigration Scams

lead_paragraph: Advocacy groups barely waited for President Barack Obama to finish speaking about sweeping changes to the U.S. immigration system to start warning about scams.
